text: ) The numbers 2, 3, 5 and 7 are the only prime numbers in X. Subsets which have at least one prime number = Total subsets — Subsets which do not have any prime number. Total subsets = 28 = 256 Subsets which do not have any prime number : We cannot select 2, 3, 5, 7; So, for each of the remaining 4 elements, we have 2 choices. So, 24 such subsets Subsets which have at least one prime number = Total subsets — Subsets which do not have any prime number. = 256 — 16 = 240. .
